EmailTemplate.description: Sent when a partner complains that they do not come up on the dealer locator.
EmailTemplate.name: Dealer Locator Clarification
EmailTemplate.subject: SunPower Partner Acknowledgement
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
This notification provides confirmation that {!Account.Name} is an active - contracted - member of SunPower's North American reseller program as of <TODAY'S DATE>. SunPower's Dealer Locator, launched on our consumer site in the Fall of 2010, was designed to display a finite number of Partners in any given region. {!Account.Name}'s exclusion from this list in no way implies that they have not met the stringent requirements to become a SunPower Dealer/Partner.
Please feel free to contact your RSM or Partner Experience if you have any questions and thank you again for choosing to work with SunPower.
Regards,
Tom Dowley Partner Experience Manager – RLC North America SunPower Corporation 3939 North First Street t 408.457.2335 f 408.240.5400 c 650.575.7095 thomas.dowley@sunpowercorp.com www.sunpowercorp.com
